# The `MCCVLoc` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Instances of this class represent the information from a .cv&#95;loc directive. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MCCVLoc</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Instances of this class represent the information from a .cv&#95;loc directive.
